name: IONITE
description:
My second game! I tried using a limited palette for this one, and having the sprites styled after MSX graphics.

This game is a simple shooter inspired by Space Impact.

Anyway, Here's the plot:

On the planet Enkron, scientists have created a powerful supercomputer named "Orion". Orion was made to be an ally of the  inhabitants of Enkron, but when he was booted up for the first time, all that was in his head was hatred. Orion escaped the lab, and now threatens to destroy the entire planet! In order to stop this, the scientists created a robotic ship called "Ionite" to try to defeat Orion. Now you must take control of Ionite, take down Orion, and save all of Enkron!
